title: 4.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Write a program to find the next 100 leap years. A leap year is exactly divisible by four except for the century years (years ending with 00). The century year is a leap year only if it is perfectly divisible by 400.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
